turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order pizzas, please, for takeout.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where do you want to purchase from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good. what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Three medium, the first one is going to be Hawaiian, the second is Alfredo, and the third is pepperoni and sausage. And, can I have those as all thick crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me read that back to you. let me know if i got anything wrong. 3 medium pizzas all with thick crust, 1 pizza being hawaiian, the 2nd being alfredo, and the 3rd being pepperoni and sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me fetch the total for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for 3 medium pizzas it will be $36.99.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to order this now using the card on file.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Okay, great. No, thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds good. i've placed your order.
